thread.title: Iconic Springmaid resort in Myrtle Beach getting makeover; becoming a Hilton DoubleTree
thread.title_full: Iconic Springmaid resort in Myrtle Beach getting makeover; becoming a Hilton DoubleTree - Winnipeg Free Press

author: The Associated Press
title: Iconic Springmaid resort in Myrtle Beach getting makeover; becoming a Hilton DoubleTree
text:
MYRTLE BEACH, S.C. - A major renovation is beginning next month at Myrtle Beach's Springmaid Beach Resort which opened more than 60 years ago.
Local media outlets report the 30-acre resort next to Springmaid Pier was sold in December for $40 million.
As part of the makeover, the 450 guest rooms will be renovated and a 1950s'-era eatery will be replaced with a new oceanfront restaurant, bar and outdoor courtyard.
Once the renovation is finished the resort, which also includes a conference centre and camping facility, will be rebranded by its new owners as a DoubleTree by Hilton.
